text: Defence Attach of the United States Embassy in Sri Lanka Lt Col Douglas Hess made a call on to the Secretary to the Ministry of Defence Mr. Kapila Waidyaratne PC yesterday (27th Thursday, July) at the Ministry.During the meeting a cordial discussion was held between the Secretary and the US Defence Attach.Military Liaison Officer of the MoD Maj Gen DAR Ranawaka was also present at the occasion.Defence Attach of the United States Embassy in Sri Lanka Lt Col Douglas Hess made a call on to the Secretary to the Ministry of Defence Mr. Kapila Waidyaratne PC yesterday (27th Thursday, July) at the Ministry.During the meeting a cordial discussion was held between the Secretary and the US Defence Attach.Military Liaison Officer of the MoD Maj Gen DAR Ranawaka was also present at the occasion.
title: US Defence Attach calls on the Secretary
